Chan Master Fu Yang Shan Zhao Chan Master Fu Yang Tai Zi Yuan Shan Zhao, a man from Tai Yuan Yu's family.
He had a deep and profound character.
At a young age, he had great wisdom without any adornments.
He naturally understood all written texts without being taught by a teacher.
When he was fourteen, his parents passed away one after another.
He was alone and weary of worldly dust and toil.
Therefore, he shaved his head and received the precepts.
He traveled with his staff, staying in few places.
He did not enjoy sightseeing.
He would ask questions according to the circumstances.
He visited and served seventy-one Chan masters of various directions.
In the end, he arrived at Shou Shan.
One day, Shou Shan ascended the seat.
Master Fu Yang came out and asked:
What is the meaning of Baizhang rolling up the mat?
The mountain said:
The dragon's sleeve is brushed open, and the whole body is revealed.
Fu Yang said: What is the master's meaning?
The mountain said:
Where the elephant king goes, the fox's tracks are cut off.
The master was greatly enlightened upon hearing these words. He bowed and said:
The ancient blue pool, the moon in the empty sky.
After searching three times, one finally understands.
Someone asked:
What principle did you see that you are so self-assured?
The master said:
This is precisely where I let go of my life and death.
Later, he traveled through Hengzhou, Hunan, and Xiangyang.
The prefectural governors repeatedly invited him to famous temples, but he declined eight times.
He firmly lay down and did not reply.
After Mount Shou died,
the monks and laypeople of Xihe sent monk Qichong to invite him to be the abbot.
The master closed the door and lay down.
Qichong pushed open the door and said:
The great matter of the Buddha Dharma, let go of petty principles.
Fengxue feared that the prophecy would come true and the teachings would be lost.
Fortunately, there was the previous master.
The previous master has already passed away.
You have the power to bear the great Dharma of the TathÄgata.
Why do you want to sleep peacefully at this time?
The master suddenly got up and took hold of Cong's hand, saying:
Without you, I would not have heard this phrase.
Hurry and prepare, I am leaving.
Having arrived, he sat in meditation on a single mat.
His feet did not cross the threshold for thirty years.
Monks and laypeople alike called him Fanyang but did not dare name him.
He addressed the assembly, saying:
At the gate of Fanyang there is a lion of Xihe sitting in the doorway.
Whenever someone comes, he immediately bites and kills them.
What expedient means can one use to enter the gate of Fanyang and see the person of Fanyang?
If one sees the person of Fanyang,
one can be a teacher of the patriarchs and buddhas.
Those who do not see the person of Fanyang are all dead men standing.
Is there anyone now who can enter?
You must quickly enter and avoid letting down your whole life.ğŸ”½Those who are not guests of Longmen must beware of being marked.
Who are the guests of Longmen? All are marked.
He raised his staff and said:
Quickly retreat, quickly retreat! Take care!
He also addressed the assembly, saying:
Every phrase must contain the three mysteries, and each mystery must contain the three essentials.
Which phrase contains the three mysteries and three essentials?
Quickly understand it well.
Each of you should contemplate.
Have you attained peace of mind yet?
In the past, when the ancient sages traveled to study,
they heard a single cause and condition that was not yet clear in the middle.
They had no taste for food and no comfort in sleep.
They urgently sought to resolve it, not regarding it as a small matter.
Therefore, the great enlightened ancient sages appeared in the world for the sake of the great matter of the cause and condition of enlightenment.
I think that from the past, when they traveled to study,
they did not travel to the mountains and waters to enjoy the luxury of the prefectures and states.
Every piece of clothing and morsel of food was for the sake of not yet penetrating the enlightened mind.
Therefore, they drove themselves to travel to study,
resolving and selecting the profound, transmitting and propagating it.
They extensively inquired of those who knew before and befriended those of high virtue.
This is because they wanted to continue the Buddha's mind-lamp and succeed to the ancestral generation,
to promote the holy lineage and guide future generations.
It is only for one's own benefit and the benefit of others.
Is there anyone discussing this now?
If there is, come out and let's discuss it together.
A monk asked:

He said,

The three mysteries and three essentials are difficult to distinguish.
If you understand the meaning and forget the words, the Way is easy to approach.
One sentence clearly encompasses myriad phenomena.

The master stopped the night meditation because of the severe cold in Bingzhou and Fenzhou.

In the hall, every single phrase must be equipped with the three mysteries.

The master addressed the assembly, saying,

fifty li.
